Estabelecemos uma parceria estratégica c: We have established a strategic partnership with the Invistech project, a high-liquidity token, to ensure the sustainability and efficiency of our passive income system.
O InvisTribe é uma plataforma descentral: InvisTribe is a decentralized platform built on blockchain, designed to connect participants in a sustainable and transparent financial contribution system, promoting security and accessibility.
Adquirir um emblema é o primeiro passo p: Acquiring an emblem is the first step to joining the system. Emblems represent your level of engagement, ranging from 1 to 50, with values adjusted according to the chosen level. This acquisition marks your entry into the community.
A cada período predefinido, você realiza: At each predefined period, you make a contribution proportional to your emblem level. These contributions support the operation and continuity of the system, ensuring the distribution of rewards.
As distribuições estão disponíveis para: Distributions are available for request at specific intervals, determined by your emblem level. The distributed amount is calculated based on your contribution and the system's performance.
Como funciona o bônus por indicação?: How does the referral bonus work?
Receba 10% do valor movimentado por memb: Earn 10% of the value transacted by members directly referred by you, including emblem acquisitions and regular contributions. Additionally, earn a 1% bonus for each additional referral level up to the 10th level, allowing you to expand your earnings while strengthening your network.
O que acontece se uma solicitação não fo: What happens if a request is not fulfilled within 24 hours?
Caso uma solicitação permaneça pendente: If a request remains pending for more than 24 hours, the corresponding amounts will be settled in Invistech tokens, which can be easily converted into other cryptocurrencies or stablecoins, ensuring flexibility and liquidity.
